<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4847</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chief Examiner's Report LCA Hotel Catering &Tourism</string>
            <string language="es">Informe del examinador principal para el Certificado aplicado Leaving (LCA, Leaving Certificate Applied) de Gastronomía hotelera y Turismo</string>
            <string language="ga">Tuairisc an PhríomhScrúdaitheoir Ardteist Feidhmeach Lónadóireacht & Turasóireacht Óstáin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hotel-Lebesmittelanschaffung &Tourism Des 
Hauptprüfers Des Report-LCA</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">&Tourism de Restauration D'Hôtel de l'État LCA 
De l'Examinateur En chef</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">&Tourism Do Catering Do Hotel Do Relatório LCA Do
Examinador Principal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">&Tourism Di Approvvigionamento Dell'Hotel Di 
Relazione LCA Dell'Ispettore Principale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προϊστάμενος τομέας εστιάσεως &Tourism ξενοδοχείων 
εκθέσεων LCA του εξεταστή</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Word document with copy of the Chief Examiner's Report - Leaving Certificate Applied 1998 - Hotel Catering and Tourism. This document is also available on the Department of Education's Website as detailed below.</string>
            <string language="es">Documento Word con copia del informe del Examinador principal. del Certificado Leaving aplicado de 1998 – Gastronomía hotelera y Turismo. Este documento también está disponible en la página web del Departamento de Educación, como aparece posteriormente.</string>
            <string language="ga">Cáipéis Word le cóip de Thuairisc an PhríomhScrúdaitheora – Ardteist Feidhmeach 1989 – Lónadóireacht Óstáin & Turasóireacht Tá an cháipéis le fáil freisin ar láithreán Gréasáin na Roinne Oideachais mar a leagtar amach thíos.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA</string>
            <string language="ga">Ardteist Feidhmeach</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fassen Sie Dokument mit Exemplar des HauptReports 
des prüfers - verlassende Bescheinigung wendete 1998 an - 
Hotel-Lebesmittelanschaffung und Tourismus ab. Dieses Dokument 
ist auch auf dem Ministerium für Erziehung und Wissenschaft Web site 
vorhanden, wie unten genau geschildert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exprimez le document avec la copie de l'état de 
l'examinateur en chef - certificat de fin d'études a appliqué 1998 -
restauration et tourisme d'hôtel. Ce document est également 
disponible sur le service du site Web d'éducation comme détaillé 
ci-dessous.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exprima o original com cópia do relatório do 
examinador principal - certificado sair aplicou 1998 - catering e 
tourism do hotel. Este original está também disponível no 
departamento do Web site de instrução como detalhado abaixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esprima il documento con la copia della relazione 
dell'ispettore principale - certificato andante ha applicato 1998 - 
approvvigionamento e turismo dell'hotel. Questo documento è 
egualmente disponibile sul reparto del Web site della formazione come 
dettagliato sotto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έγγραφο λέξης με το αντίγραφο της Προϊστάμενος έκθεσης 
του εξεταστή - το πιστοποιητικό αναχώρησης εφάρμοσε το 1998 - 
τομέας εστιάσεως και τουρισμός ξενοδοχείων. Το παρόν 
έγγραφο είναι επίσης διαθέσιμο στο τμήμα ιστοχώρου της 
εκπαίδευσης όπως εκτίθεται λεπτομερώς κατωτέρω.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa Supplementare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.
